msbt.message: I got your letter and gift! I liked that you let the present speak for itself. I totally knew what you were going for, and I liked knowing you knew I'd know that. I bet you'll figure out what this is about too.

Thanks for the present! The short note you sent with it made it seem like a mystery, and opening up the gift felt like solving it. I thought you might like that feeling too, so I sent you this in return. Or did I?!

There weren't a lot of words in that letter, but I could tell you picked every one of them carefully. That's some talent you got! Thanks for thinking of me, and here's a thing to show I'm thinking of you too.
Got your message. Short, sweet and to the point. Not bad. Gave me some ideas. Think I'll try it for myself. It's already getting long though. I need a sign-off too? This is harder than it looks.
Thanks for the letter! You know how to keep it short and sweet, huh? That might have backfired though... It was SO short that I read it over and over, trying to find hidden meanings!
Thanks for the letter. It didn't take long to read, which was cool. Can't stand when people won't get to the point about stuff! Hmm, I should follow my own advice, huh? Yeah, this letter's over now!
